title: ORP9-PH domain-based fluorescent reporters for visualizing phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate dynamics in living cells
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,544-555
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00232B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Moeka Ajiki, Masaru Yoshikawa, Tomoki Miyazaki, Asami Kawasaki, Kazuhiro Aoki, Fubito Nakatsu, Shinya Tsukiji
New fluorescent reporters based on the ORP9 PH domain visualize phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate (PI4P) dynamics at multiple cellular locations with high specificity and contrast in live-cell imaging.
